summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing Ghislaine Maxwell's motion to stay a civil suit. The correspondence includes the filing of the motion and plans to oppose it.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Maxwell is the subject of the legal discussion; she has filed a motion to stay a civil suit against her.

events.title: Maxwell files motion to stay civil suit
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell files a motion to stay a civil lawsuit against her.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell filed a motion to stay a civil lawsuit on August 19, 2020.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York intended to oppose Maxwell's motion.
The document is an internal email chain among federal prosecutors discussing legal strategy regarding Maxwell's case.
